On Fri, Sep 3, 2010 at 4:29 AM, bryan_w_taylor <bryan_w_taylor@...> wrote:
> What do people consider best practices for versioning of RESTful web services? There seem to
> be two common approaches: stuff the versions into the URI somewhere and version the media
> types and use content negotiation. What are the pros and cons of each approach?

http://barelyenough.org/blog/2008/05/versioning-rest-web-services/
http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rest-discuss/message/13218
